scripts.publish:all: lerna publish --skip-git --skip-npm && lerna exec -- npm publish --access=public
scripts.build:app:ui: cd packages/klingon-ui/ && npm run build && cd - && cp -R ./packages/klingon-ui/dist ./packages/klingon-app/dist-ui
scripts.package:app:osx: npm run build:app:ui && cd ./packages/klingon-app/ && npm run package:osx
scripts.package:app:linux: npm run build:app:ui && cd ./packages/klingon-app/ && npm run package:linux
scripts.package:app:win: npm run build:app:ui && cd ./packages/klingon-app/ && npm run package:win
